member.name: CERT_SIGNED_CONTENT_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_SIGNED_CONTENT_INFO structure contains encoded content to be signed and a BLOB to hold the signature. The ToBeSigned member is an encoded,, or.

member.name: CERT_SIGNED_CONTENT_INFO.ToBeSigned
member.summary: A BLOB that has been encoded by using Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) and that is to be signed.

member.name: CERT_SIGNED_CONTENT_INFO.SignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains the signature algorithm type and any associated additional parameters.

member.name: CERT_SIGNED_CONTENT_INFO.Signature
member.summary: BLOB containing a signed hash of the encoded data.
